name: all you need . . . single notecard
description:
this card is perfect for valentine's day, or any time you just want to tell someone you love them!

the design was hand drawn, digitally colored, and printed with archival inks onto a 100% recycled folded card.  the notecard measures 4 1/4" by 5 1/2" and is blank inside.  

arrives packaged neatly in a poly sleeve with a matching pink shimmery envelope.

name: love print
description:
print of an original digital illustration by lesley a. sico (that's me!).  hang this little lovely on your wall to remind you that all you really need is love.  a perfect gift for valentine's day - or any day!

print measures 8.5" x 5.5" and is printed with fade resistant inks on high quality, acid free fine art paper.

each print is signed by the artist on the back and shipped in a flat rigid mailer to prevent bending or creasing.  please note: the frame in the second photograph is NOT included.

name: hello deer . . . . . . . . petite notecard set
description:
this set of 5 notecards features a whimsical design of a paper cut doe and buck, meeting under a lacy canopy.

the design is printed with archival inks onto 100% recycled folded cards.  petite notecards measure 4 7/8" by 3 1/2" - the perfect size for a quick thank you or hello.

cards and matching envelopes will arrive packaged neatly in a poly sleeve with a 315thomas label.

*make it a gift*
coordinates perfectly with my hello deer hand printed pocket journal!

name: anemone . . . petite notecard set
description:
these notecards feature a playful design inspired by sea anemones.  each set includes four cards in four different colors - coral, navy, raspberry, and jade - along with matching white envelopes.

the designs are  hand drawn, then digitally colored and printed onto 100% recycled folded notecards.  petite cards measure 4 7/8" by 3 1/2" - the perfect size for a quick thank you or hello.

notecard set will arrive packaged neatly in a poly sleeve with a 315thomas label.

name: vintage lace . . . . . . . petite notecard set
description:
this set of cards features 4 different designs based on pieces from my mother's collection of vintage linens in fun, fresh color combinations.  

the designs are printed onto 100% recycled folded notecards.  petite cards measure 4 7/8" by 3 1/2" - the perfect size for a quick thank you or hello.

cards and matching envelopes will arrive packaged neatly in a poly sleeve with a 315thomas label.

order a set of 4 and receive 1 of each design; order a set of 8 and receive 2 of each design.
